ISSUE.TITLE: Do not store "clean" passwords for external authentication systems
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: We've found a problem with Facebook External Authentication. If somebody use it to login in the store, nopCommerce will create explicit password, which is a combination of numbers. We think it should be done in a safer way. For example, encrypted like a normal password. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/55007/facebook-external-authentication-password-problem.aspx

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3235 Passwords for external authentication systems are created as hashed
